eu.ehri.project.acl
Class AclManager

java.lang.Object
  eu.ehri.project.acl.AclManager

public final class AclManager
extends Object

Helper class for checking and asserting access and write permissions.

Author:
Mike Bryant (http://github.com/mikesname)
